article_title: Money to Burn? Take An Uber Car Down to Miami Beach and Get the Hell Out of the Cold – Deadline Detroit
article_text:
It's freezing and you're stuck here in Michigan.

So for the heck of it, we decided to let our imagination run wild and see what it would cost to take an Uber car from downtown Detroit to Joe's Stone Crab on Washington Avenue in Miami Beach.

Well, it ain't cheap, but it would certainly be an adventure.

The Uber calculator shows what that the trip would cost for different types of Uber cars.

Here it is:

og.description: There's plenty of ways to get out of the cold and go to Florida. We were curious how much an Uber car would cost.
